availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Shepherdsville post office, Bullitt County, Kentucky. A Kentucky-born lawyer.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, District 1, Shepherdsville post office, p. 14.

Find A Grave, William R. Thompson (1810-1894), Find A Grave Memorial # 50845630, Thompson Cemetery, Brooks, Bullitt County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=thompson&GSfn=william&GSby=1810&GSbyrel=in&GSdy=1894&GSdyrel=in&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSob=n&GRid=50845630&df=all& (accessed 29 May 2017).
